scripts.say: Bermuda Triangle - Essex Fleet Combat Zone
According to the photos taken from the air, there are two Siren fleets patrolling this area.
In terms of numbers, we're at an overwhelming disadvantage.
We're clearly just a decoy, but to think that the Sirens are still willing to face us with such numbers...
I wonder what kind of enemies Enterprise is fighting right now...
But, on the other hand... the more enemies we can draw to us, the more pressure we can take off of everyone else...!
H-huh? What are you doing, Shangri-La?
Don't worry about it, just keeping some regular old naval records.
"Essex is getting all dreamy thinking about Enterprise even when completely surrounded by the enemy" ...Whaaat?!?!
H-hold on! I was merely considering the best way to minimize our losses!
What kind of naval records are these anyway? Jeez, don't get distracted with this kind of stuff!
Of course I won't. After all, it falls upon me to record Essex's flustered expression for posterity.
Jokes aside, I personally could use a bit more time to prepare, but you know how the saying goes... A soldier can't choose her battlefield...
All ships, forward! Let's drop some freedom on those Sirens!
As an Essex-class, I can't afford to lose...
